medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Intermittent, cramping low abdominal pain began 1 week ago, followed by nausea, nonbloody, nonbilious emesis, subjective fevers, chills, and a few episodes of diarrhea over the week. The patient has had very minimal oral intake in recent days, expressing concern about hydration.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, Anxiety; Past surgical history includes ventral hernia repair as a child, lithotripsy, and oral mucosal biopsy.
medical_history.family_history: Denies history of IBD or GI cancer.
